attributes.action: launch a study into the feasibility of a coastal tramway along the South coast of England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition calls on the Prime Minister to launch a  study into the feasibility of a coastal tramway linking up the populated seaside towns and cities of Brighton, Worthing, Littlehampton, Chicester, Portsmouth, Southampton, Gosport, Christchurch, Bournemouth and Poole on the south coast of England. The proposed area is home to over 1.2 million people and would be a good investment.
